name: Shouldn't you stop ?
description:
Hi everyone my name is Prétauhi,

This is the first game jam (The Wowie Jam 3.0) I am participating and my first game ever (Shouldn’t you stop?).

In this game you play as a broken-hearted protagonist, that tries to get his girlfriend back.

You can move using the Up and Down keys and you can skip the dialogue scene with any keys.

I used the free web trial version of Construct 3 to create the game.

I made all of the art myself but I used the site FreeSound for the sound's effects.

*SPOILER* There is three small endings to the game (You stopped in time, you get hurt by the words of your ex-girlfriends or you get arrested). *SPOILER*

Hope you enjoyed the game!
